document_data.name: ''RoarRiven''
document_data.author: [[Halavar Thentle]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''RoarRiven''''' was a [[chapbook]] of poetry published in the mid-15{{th}} century [[DR]]. {{quote|I feel it coming, heavy and thunderous, rising like
menacing [[war-drum]]s to that moment when
Death is loosed, a thousand warriors shrieking
As war bursts its bonds, and the realm knows stormbreak.|Excerpt from ''War, Stormbreak, and Tears''}}
document_data.History: One of the contributors to ''RoarRiven'' was [[Halavar Thentle]], [[Bard]] of [[Wheloon]], who published his poem, ''War, Stormbreak, and Tears'', on the pages of the chapbook in the {{YearlinkName|1466}}.
